description.value:
You slam your hands together to unleash a deafening blast. Creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] cone take @Damage[(max(3,floor(@actor.level/2)))d6[sonic]] damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] against your class DC. Creatures that critically fail their save are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 minute. You can't use this ability again for [[/r 1d4 #Recharge Thunder Clap]]{1d4 rounds} as your hands recover from the thunderous vibrations.

At 8th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage from Thunder Clap increases by 1d6.
